attributes.action: Introduce compulsory IT training for all MP's on taking up office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's possess a woeful knowledge of both basic and higher Information Technology. Many openly admit to being technophobes. In consideration of this lack of understanding and the many failed and failing IT Government projects which have cost the UK tax payer millions of pounds, all MP's should required to submit to both basic hands-on IT training and classroom lectures to better understand the ability and limits of computers and associated systems.
